headline: The Real Reason Investors Should Be Excited for Ford's China Negotiations
summary: Turning around its business in Europe will be a big win, but what it could learn from a Chinese rival might be even more valuable.

headline: From 'slippery slope' to 'existential threat,' auto CEOs sound alarm on Chinese competition
summary: Western automakers, from the Big Three to EV pure plays, are delivering the same stark warning: Chinese automakers pose a threat to their survival if domestic production isn't protected.

raw.headline: From 'slippery slope' to 'existential threat,' auto CEOs sound alarm on Chinese competition
raw.summary: Western automakers, from the Big Three to EV pure plays, are delivering the same stark warning: Chinese automakers pose a threat to their survival if domestic production isn't protected.

headline: Can This Top Stock Really Rebound in the World's Largest Market?
summary: Turning around its business in China is important to General Motors and its investors, and there's a little good news in that area.

raw.headline: Can This Top Stock Really Rebound in the World's Largest Market?

headline: Stellantis Has Stalled. The Stock Can Kick Into High Gear Again.
summary: From this low base,  Stellantis  stock can rise 50% with little more than basic business execution.  The Chrysler parent’s Feb. 6 announcement covered a lot of ground, including one-time charges of 22 billion euros ($25.9 billion) for electric-vehicle asset write-downs and warranty-related items.  The company said operating profit for the second half of 2025 would come in below guidance.

raw.headline: Stellantis Has Stalled. The Stock Can Kick Into High Gear Again.

The company said operating profit for the second half of 2025 would come in below guidance.

headline: America Fell Out of Love With the Sedan. Detroit Wants to Bring It Back.
summary: With drivers looking for more affordable options, U.S. automakers are having second thoughts about abandoning the mass-market sedan.

raw.headline: America Fell Out of Love With the Sedan. Detroit Wants to Bring It Back.

headline: Universities Feel a Fiscal Squeeze Despite Solid Performance
summary: Rising costs and Trump pressure on higher education boosted endowment spending. Fortunately, returns on stocks provided a cushion.
